@classmethod
def extract_border_pts(cls, field, axis, front_side, field_dim=1, offset=0): 
1301    @classmethod
1302    def extract_border_pts(cls, field, axis, front_side, field_dim=1, offset=0):
1303        npa = field.ndim - field_dim
1304        base_face = np.hstack((np.arange(axis + 1, npa), np.arange(axis)))
1305        if not front_side:
1306            base_face = base_face[::-1]
1307        border_field = field.transpose(
1308            axis + field_dim, *np.arange(field_dim), *(base_face + field_dim)
1309        )[(-(1 + offset) if front_side else offset)]
1310        return border_field
@classmethod
def extract_border_spline(cls, spline, axis, front_side): 
1312    @classmethod
1313    def extract_border_spline(cls, spline, axis, front_side):
1314        base_face = np.hstack((np.arange(axis + 1, spline.NPa), np.arange(axis)))
1315        if not front_side:
1316            base_face = base_face[::-1]
1317        degrees = spline.getDegrees()
1318        knots = spline.getKnots()
1319        border_degrees = [degrees[i] for i in base_face]
1320        border_knots = [knots[i] for i in base_face]
1321        border_spline = BSpline(border_degrees, border_knots)
1322        return border_spline
@classmethod
def transpose_and_flip(cls, field, transpose, flip, field_dim=1): 
1324    @classmethod
1325    def transpose_and_flip(cls, field, transpose, flip, field_dim=1):
1326        field = field.transpose(*np.arange(field_dim), *(transpose + field_dim))
1327        for i in range(flip.size):
1328            if flip[i]:
1329                field = np.flip(field, axis=(i + field_dim))
1330        return field
@classmethod
def transpose_and_flip_knots(cls, knots, spans, transpose, flip): 
1332    @classmethod
1333    def transpose_and_flip_knots(cls, knots, spans, transpose, flip):
1334        new_knots = []
1335        for i in range(flip.size):
1336            if flip[i]:
1337                new_knots.append(sum(spans[i]) - knots[transpose[i]][::-1])
1338            else:
1339                new_knots.append(knots[transpose[i]])
1340        return new_knots
@classmethod
def transpose_and_flip_back_knots(cls, knots, spans, transpose, flip): 
1342    @classmethod
1343    def transpose_and_flip_back_knots(cls, knots, spans, transpose, flip):
1344        transpose_back = np.argsort(transpose)
1345        flip_back = flip[transpose_back]
1346        return cls.transpose_and_flip_knots(knots, spans, transpose_back, flip_back)
@classmethod
def transpose_and_flip_spline(cls, spline, transpose, flip): 
1348    @classmethod
1349    def transpose_and_flip_spline(cls, spline, transpose, flip):
1350        spans = spline.getSpans()
1351        knots = spline.getKnots()
1352        degrees = spline.getDegrees()
1353        for i in range(flip.size):
1354            p = degrees[transpose[i]]
1355            knot = knots[transpose[i]]
1356            if flip[i]:
1357                knot = sum(spans[i]) - knot[::-1]
1358            spline.bases[i] = BSplineBasis(p, knot)
1359        return spline
@classmethod
def from_splines(cls, separated_ctrl_pts, splines): 
1361    @classmethod
1362    def from_splines(cls, separated_ctrl_pts, splines):
1363        NPa = splines[0].NPa
1364        assert np.all(
1365            [sp.NPa == NPa for sp in splines]
1366        ), "Every patch should have the same parametric space dimension !"
1367        NPh = separated_ctrl_pts[0].shape[0]
1368        assert np.all(
1369            [ctrl_pts.shape[0] == NPh for ctrl_pts in separated_ctrl_pts]
1370        ), "Every patch should have the same physical space dimension !"
1371        npatch = len(splines)
1372        all_flip = np.unpackbits(
1373            np.arange(2 ** (NPa - 1), dtype="uint8")[:, None],
1374            axis=1,
1375            count=(NPa - 1 - 8),
1376            bitorder="little",
1377        )[:, ::-1].astype("bool")
1378        all_transpose = np.array(list(permutations(np.arange(NPa - 1))))
1379        spline1_inds = []
1380        spline2_inds = []
1381        axes1 = []
1382        axes2 = []
1383        front_sides1 = []
1384        front_sides2 = []
1385        transpose_2_to_1 = []
1386        flip_2_to_1 = []
1387        for spline1_ind in range(npatch):
1388            spline1 = splines[spline1_ind]
1389            ctrl_pts1 = separated_ctrl_pts[spline1_ind]
1390            # print(f"sp1 {spline1_ind}")
1391            for spline2_ind in range(spline1_ind + 1, npatch):
1392                spline2 = splines[spline2_ind]
1393                ctrl_pts2 = separated_ctrl_pts[spline2_ind]
1394                # print(f"|sp2 {spline2_ind}")
1395                for axis1 in range(spline1.NPa):
1396                    degrees1 = np.hstack(
1397                        (
1398                            spline1.getDegrees()[(axis1 + 1) :],
1399                            spline1.getDegrees()[:axis1],
1400                        )
1401                    )
1402                    knots1 = (
1403                        spline1.getKnots()[(axis1 + 1) :] + spline1.getKnots()[:axis1]
1404                    )
1405                    # print(f"||ax1 {axis1}")
1406                    for axis2 in range(spline2.NPa):
1407                        degrees2 = np.hstack(
1408                            (
1409                                spline2.getDegrees()[(axis2 + 1) :],
1410                                spline2.getDegrees()[:axis2],
1411                            )
1412                        )
1413                        knots2 = (
1414                            spline2.getKnots()[(axis2 + 1) :]
1415                            + spline2.getKnots()[:axis2]
1416                        )
1417                        spans2 = (
1418                            spline2.getSpans()[(axis2 + 1) :]
1419                            + spline2.getSpans()[:axis2]
1420                        )
1421                        # print(f"|||ax2 {axis2}")
1422                        for front_side1 in [False, True]:
1423                            pts1 = cls.extract_border_pts(ctrl_pts1, axis1, front_side1)
1424                            # print(f"||||{'front' if front_side1 else 'back '} side1")
1425                            for front_side2 in [False, True]:
1426                                pts2 = cls.extract_border_pts(
1427                                    ctrl_pts2, axis2, front_side2
1428                                )
1429                                # print(f"|||||{'front' if front_side2 else 'back '} side2")
1430                                for transpose in all_transpose:
1431                                    # print(f"||||||transpose {transpose}")
1432                                    if (
1433                                        degrees1 == [degrees2[i] for i in transpose]
1434                                    ).all():
1435                                        # print(f"||||||same degrees {degrees1}")
1436                                        if list(pts1.shape[1:]) == [
1437                                            pts2.shape[1:][i] for i in transpose
1438                                        ]:
1439                                            # print(f"||||||same shapes {pts1.shape[1:]}")
1440                                            if np.all(
1441                                                [
1442                                                    knots1[i].size
1443                                                    == knots2[transpose[i]].size
1444                                                    for i in range(NPa - 1)
1445                                                ]
1446                                            ):
1447                                                # print(f"||||||same knots sizes {[knots1[i].size for i in range(NPa - 1)]}")
1448                                                for flip in all_flip:
1449                                                    # print(f"|||||||flip {flip}")
1450                                                    if np.all(
1451                                                        [
1452                                                            (k1 == k2).all()
1453                                                            for k1, k2 in zip(
1454                                                                knots1,
1455                                                                cls.transpose_and_flip_knots(
1456                                                                    knots2,
1457                                                                    spans2,
1458                                                                    transpose,
1459                                                                    flip,
1460                                                                ),
1461                                                            )
1462                                                        ]
1463                                                    ):
1464                                                        # print(f"|||||||same knots {knots1}")
1465                                                        pts2_turned = (
1466                                                            cls.transpose_and_flip(
1467                                                                pts2, transpose, flip
1468                                                            )
1469                                                        )
1470                                                        if np.allclose(
1471                                                            pts1, pts2_turned
1472                                                        ):
1473                                                            # print("_________________GOGOGO_________________")
1474                                                            spline1_inds.append(
1475                                                                spline1_ind
1476                                                            )
1477                                                            spline2_inds.append(
1478                                                                spline2_ind
1479                                                            )
1480                                                            axes1.append(axis1)
1481                                                            axes2.append(axis2)
1482                                                            front_sides1.append(
1483                                                                front_side1
1484                                                            )
1485                                                            front_sides2.append(
1486                                                                front_side2
1487                                                            )
1488                                                            transpose_2_to_1.append(
1489                                                                transpose
1490                                                            )
1491                                                            flip_2_to_1.append(flip)
1492        spline1_inds = np.array(spline1_inds, dtype="int")
1493        spline2_inds = np.array(spline2_inds, dtype="int")
1494        axes1 = np.array(axes1, dtype="int")
1495        axes2 = np.array(axes2, dtype="int")
1496        front_sides1 = np.array(front_sides1, dtype="bool")
1497        front_sides2 = np.array(front_sides2, dtype="bool")
1498        transpose_2_to_1 = np.array(transpose_2_to_1, dtype="int")
1499        flip_2_to_1 = np.array(flip_2_to_1, dtype="bool")
1500        return cls(
1501            spline1_inds,
1502            spline2_inds,
1503            axes1,
1504            axes2,
1505            front_sides1,
1506            front_sides2,
1507            transpose_2_to_1,
1508            flip_2_to_1,
1509            NPa,
1510        )
def append(self, other): 
1512    def append(self, other):
1513        if self.NPa != other.NPa:
1514            raise ValueError(
1515                f"operands could not be concatenated with parametric spaces of dimensions {self.NPa} and {other.NPa}"
1516            )
1517        self.spline1_inds = np.concatenate(
1518            (self.spline1_inds, other.spline1_inds), axis=0
1519        )
1520        self.spline2_inds = np.concatenate(
1521            (self.spline2_inds, other.spline2_inds), axis=0
1522        )
1523        self.axes1 = np.concatenate((self.axes1, other.axes1), axis=0)
1524        self.axes2 = np.concatenate((self.axes2, other.axes2), axis=0)
1525        self.front_sides1 = np.concatenate(
1526            (self.front_sides1, other.front_sides1), axis=0
1527        )
1528        self.front_sides2 = np.concatenate(
1529            (self.front_sides2, other.front_sides2), axis=0
1530        )
1531        self.transpose_2_to_1 = np.concatenate(
1532            (self.transpose_2_to_1, other.transpose_2_to_1), axis=0
1533        )
1534        self.flip_2_to_1 = np.concatenate((self.flip_2_to_1, other.flip_2_to_1), axis=0)
1535        self.nb_couples += other.nb_couples
def get_operator_allxi1_to_allxi2(self, spans1, spans2, couple_ind): 
1537    def get_operator_allxi1_to_allxi2(self, spans1, spans2, couple_ind):
1538        ax1 = self.axes1[couple_ind]
1539        ax2 = self.axes2[couple_ind]
1540        front1 = self.front_sides1[couple_ind]
1541        front2 = self.front_sides2[couple_ind]
1542        transpose = self.transpose_2_to_1[couple_ind]
1543        flip = self.flip_2_to_1[couple_ind]
1544
1545        A = np.zeros((self.NPa, self.NPa), dtype="float")
1546        A[ax2, ax1] = -1 if front1 == front2 else 1
1547        arr = np.arange(self.NPa)
1548        j1 = np.hstack((arr[(ax1 + 1) :], arr[:ax1]))
1549        j2 = np.hstack((arr[(ax2 + 1) :], arr[:ax2]))
1550        A[j2[transpose], j1] = [-1 if f else 1 for f in flip]
1551        b = np.zeros(self.NPa, dtype="float")
1552        b[ax2] = (int(front1) + int(front2)) * (1 if front2 else -1)
1553        b[j2[transpose]] = [1 if f else 0 for f in flip]
1554
1555        alpha1, beta1 = np.array(spans1).T
1556        M1, p1 = np.diag(1 / (beta1 - alpha1)), -alpha1 / (beta1 - alpha1)
1557        alpha2, beta2 = np.array(spans2).T
1558        M2, p2 = np.diag(beta2 - alpha2), alpha2
1559        b = p2 + M2 @ b + M2 @ A @ p1
1560        A = M2 @ A @ M1
1561
1562        return A, b
def get_connectivity(self, shape_by_patch): 
1564    def get_connectivity(self, shape_by_patch):
1565        indices = []
1566        start = 0
1567        for shape in shape_by_patch:
1568            end = start + np.prod(shape)
1569            indices.append(np.arange(start, end).reshape(shape))
1570            start = end
1571        nodes_couples = []
1572        for i in range(self.nb_couples):
1573            border_inds1 = self.__class__.extract_border_pts(
1574                indices[self.spline1_inds[i]],
1575                self.axes1[i],
1576                self.front_sides1[i],
1577                field_dim=0,
1578            )
1579            border_inds2 = self.__class__.extract_border_pts(
1580                indices[self.spline2_inds[i]],
1581                self.axes2[i],
1582                self.front_sides2[i],
1583                field_dim=0,
1584            )
1585            border_inds2_turned_and_fliped = self.__class__.transpose_and_flip(
1586                border_inds2, self.transpose_2_to_1[i], self.flip_2_to_1[i], field_dim=0
1587            )
1588            nodes_couples.append(
1589                np.hstack(
1590                    (
1591                        border_inds1.reshape((-1, 1)),
1592                        border_inds2_turned_and_fliped.reshape((-1, 1)),
1593                    )
1594                )
1595            )
1596        if len(nodes_couples) > 0:
1597            nodes_couples = np.vstack(nodes_couples)
1598        return MultiPatchBSplineConnectivity.from_nodes_couples(
1599            nodes_couples, shape_by_patch
1600        )
def get_borders_couples(self, separated_field, offset=0): 
1602    def get_borders_couples(self, separated_field, offset=0):
1603        field_dim = separated_field[0].ndim - self.NPa
1604        borders1 = []
1605        borders2_turned_and_fliped = []
1606        for i in range(self.nb_couples):
1607            border1 = self.__class__.extract_border_pts(
1608                separated_field[self.spline1_inds[i]],
1609                self.axes1[i],
1610                self.front_sides1[i],
1611                offset=offset,
1612                field_dim=field_dim,
1613            )
1614            borders1.append(border1)
1615            border2 = self.__class__.extract_border_pts(
1616                separated_field[self.spline2_inds[i]],
1617                self.axes2[i],
1618                self.front_sides2[i],
1619                offset=offset,
1620                field_dim=field_dim,
1621            )
1622            border2_turned_and_fliped = self.__class__.transpose_and_flip(
1623                border2,
1624                self.transpose_2_to_1[i],
1625                self.flip_2_to_1[i],
1626                field_dim=field_dim,
1627            )
1628            borders2_turned_and_fliped.append(border2_turned_and_fliped)
1629        return borders1, borders2_turned_and_fliped
def get_borders_couples_splines(self, splines):

1634        for i in range(self.nb_couples):

def compute_border_couple_DN( self, couple_ind: int, splines: list[bsplyne.b_spline.BSpline], XI1_border: list[numpy.ndarray], k1: list[int]): 
1693    def compute_border_couple_DN(
1694        self,
1695        couple_ind: int,
1696        splines: list[BSpline],
1697        XI1_border: list[np.ndarray],
1698        k1: list[int],
1699    ):
1700        spline1 = splines[self.spline1_inds[couple_ind]]
1701        spans1 = spline1.getSpans()
1702        ax1 = self.axes1[couple_ind]
1703        front1 = self.front_sides1[couple_ind]
1704        XI1 = (
1705            XI1_border[(self.NPa - 1 - ax1) :]
1706            + [np.array([spline1.bases[ax1].span[int(front1)]])]
1707            + XI1_border[: (self.NPa - 1 - ax1)]
1708        )
1709        DN1 = spline1.DN(XI1, k=k1)
1710
1711        spline2 = splines[self.spline2_inds[couple_ind]]
1712        spans2 = spline2.getSpans()
1713        ax2 = self.axes2[couple_ind]
1714        front2 = self.front_sides2[couple_ind]
1715        transpose = self.transpose_2_to_1[couple_ind]
1716        A, b = self.get_operator_allxi1_to_allxi2(spans1, spans2, couple_ind)
1717        XI2 = []
1718        for i in range(self.NPa):
1719            j = np.argmax(np.abs(A[i]))
1720            XI2.append(A[i, j] * XI1[j] + b[i])
1721
1722        k = int(sum(k1))
1723        DN2 = spline2.DN(XI2, k=k)
1724        if k != 0:
1725            AT = 1
1726            for i in range(k):
1727                AT = np.tensordot(AT, A, 0)
1728            AT = AT.transpose(*2 * np.arange(k), *(2 * np.arange(k) + 1))
1729            DN2 = np.tensordot(DN2, AT, k)
1730            i1 = np.repeat(np.arange(self.NPa), k1)
1731            DN2 = DN2[tuple(i1.tolist())]
1732        return DN1, DN2
